description: Contains the collections agency extract history.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_HX_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the collection agency record.

columns.name: EXT_HX_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: EXT_HX_ACTIVITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Collection agency extract insurance amount


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Requested Send to Agency


Sent to Agency


Requested Recall From Agency


Recalled from Agency


Returned


Updated


Payment Collected


No Balance, Agency Cleared


User Requested Send to Agency


Users Requested Recall from Agency


Manual Request Ignored


Converted from Account Workqueue Framework


Request Resulting from Repost

columns.name: EXT_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The collection agency extract user ID for the transaction record.

columns.name: EXT_HX_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of a payment collected by the collection agency extract framework

columns.name: EXT_HX_RET_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason for the agency returning a transaction in the agency extract framework.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: EXT_HX_ACCT_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The extract activity instant. This value is stored as a UTC instant
